channel.title: Preferred Forum software that allows easy access to session data
channel.description: I am looking for something relatively lightweight and easily manipulated. What I want is to be able to pass a session_id to a server application and then have that application be able to query the database and pull simple data such as the "username" in lieu of having the user be forced to "relogin" in the client application. I enjoy vanilla but don't particularly want to use it for this application.

item.title: Preferred Forum software that allows easy access to session data

item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

much appreciated, that should do nicely.
